description: Customers love the refreshing scent and effectiveness of this foot scrub. It leaves feet feeling softer, making walking a breeze. Lasts up to 5 months. Highly recommended for transforming rough, dry skin.

We start this brew with fine sea salt crystals to cleanse and soften skin, then toss in some shower jelly bats to soften things up. Catch one and get lathering for a gentler exfoliation. Cooling peppermint and lavender flower infusions.
